content: Panayiotis Tsaparas Home Page Panayiotis Tsaparas Associate Professor Department of Computer Science & Engineering University of Ioannina Address: Department of Computer Science & Engineering University of Ioannina Ioannina 45110, Greece Room: B.3 Phone: +30 26510 08911 e-mail: tsap _at_ cs.uoi.gr Welcome...Καλώς ήρθατε... A Short History I received my B.Sc. degree from University of Crete, Heraklion, Greece, and my Ph.D. degree from University of Toronto, working under the supervision of Allan Borodin. Since then I have worked as a Post-doctoral Fellow in University of Rome, La Sapienza, working with Stefano Leonardi, and at University of Helsinki, working with Heikki Mannila, and as a Researcher at Microsoft Research, Search Labs, a group founded by Rakesh Agrawal. In 2011 I joined University of Ioannina, where I am currently Associate Professor. In 2023 I became Collaborating Senior Researcher at Archimedes Research Center. Research Interests Algorithmic Bias and Fairness Social Network & Media Analysis Algorithmic Data Mining Publications This is the full list of my publications. You can also find them in my DBLP page, or my Google Scholar page.
